sections.heading: Witnesses; credibility; impeachment
sections.text: Facts which have heretofore caused the exclusion of testimony, may still be shown for the purpose of lessening its credibility.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 330, p. 450;R.S.1913, § 7903;C.S.1922, § 8845;C.S.1929, § 20-1211;R.S.1943, § 25-1211.AnnotationsState was permitt
